rottapeli.peli

Class ScoreKeeper

  • java.lang.Object
    • rottapeli.peli.ScoreKeeper
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Updatable

    public class ScoreKeeper
extends Object
implements Updatable
    Keeps score of every player in the game. Also stores other stats of the game, including life amounts, combos, time bonus, stage number.
    Author:
    Pavel

        Parameters:

        Returns:

        Returns:

      • getBonus

        public double getBonus()
        Returns:
        Current time bonus left.

      • pointsForEatingCheese

        public void pointsForEatingCheese(int id)
        Calculates and adds score for eating cheese. Increases combo, so more points are awarded for consequtive cheese eating.
        Parameters:
        id - Which player ate cheese.

      • addScore

        public void addScore(int id,
            double points)
        Adds score. When certain amount is reached, awards an extra life.
        Parameters:
        id - Player that receives points.
        points - Amount of points that is to be added.

      • giveALife

        public void giveALife(int id)
        Give one life to a certain player.
        Parameters:
        id - Player ID.

      • loseALife

        public void loseALife(int id)
        Decereases amount of lives by one. If no lives left, signal game logic Object about it.
        Parameters:
        id - Player that lost a life.

      • pointsForFinishingStage

        public void pointsForFinishingStage(int id)
        Awards all players a time bonus for finishing a stage. Resets time bonus counter.
        Parameters:
        id - Player that triggered this event.

      • resetCombo

        public void resetCombo(int id)
        Sets combo counter to zero.
        Parameters:
        id - Player that has his/her combo reset.

      • allAttendedPlayers

        public Set<Integer> allAttendedPlayers()
        Returns:
        All player ID's that have participated in the game.

      • resetScore

        public void resetScore(Set<Integer> players)
        Resets all score data.
        Parameters:
        players - Set of player IDs that will play the game.

      • update

        public void update()
        This method is called every tick on the timer.

        ScoreKeeper decreases its time bonus counter.

        Specified by:
        update in interface Updatable
